description: Patterns are git repos, with working, deployable example code which solves a well described problem

sections.title: About this pattern
sections.instruction: Answer these questions as a comment, then check the boxes prior to proposal review.

checklist.comment: a1. Brief description of your pattern
a2. Url to your existing repo ( or a not that this is just an idea for now )
a3. Target completion date ( for instance for an event, or product )?
a4. Add labels for technology ( e.g. Node, Kubernetes, Swift, Watson etc )
a5. Are you looking for a collaborator to help publish this (y/n)?

sections.title: Pattern content
sections.instruction: Commit this content prior to publication review.

checklist.comment: c1. Architecture Diagram
c2. Description - add in readme with the architecture diagram
c3. Add in additional markdown files such as CONTRIBUTING.MD and MAINTAINERS.MD
c4. Wiki / Journey Page
c5. Blog

description: Blog posts are pearls of tech wisdom, published on the IBM Code Blog
How tos are shorter step by step solution guides

sections.title: About this how-to
sections.instruction: Answer these questions as a comment, then check the boxes prior to proposal review.

checklist.comment: a1. Provide a brief description of the how-to steps
a2. What technologies will you be highlighting?
a3. What does the how-to accomplish?
a4. Why is this a good solution?
a5. Who is your target audience?

description: Tech talks are 30 minute presentations, scheduled and broadcast over the web

sections.title: About this tech-talk
sections.instruction: Answer these questions as a comment, then check the boxes prior to proposal review.

checklist.comment: a1. Does the subject matter lend itself well to a tech talk?
a2. What is it's advocacy potential?
a3. Is there code to be written?  Will there be a live demo?
a4. Are we inheriting code?
a5. Target completion date ( for instance for an event, or product )?

description: Workshops are deeper, multi-hour, or multi-day sessions that aim to instill a level of expertise in a subject
